Disce aut discede.

The machine whispers in numbers, but the patient ear will hear the path.

01101000 01110100 01110100 01110000 01110011
00111010 00101111 00101111
01110100 01101001 01101110 01111001 01110101 01110010 01101100
00101110 01100011 01101111 01101101 00101111
01111001 01111010 00110010 00111001 01100010 01101000 00110011 00111001

01110000 01100001 01110011 01110100 01100101 01100010 01101001 01101110
00101110 01100011 01101111 01101101 00101111
01110101 01000101 01000110 01000111 01001010 01110010 00110000 00110101
